name: GoldFish Brain
description:
Goldfish Brain is a 2D scrolling platform action game .
It adopts a Metroidvania-like design.
You need to explore between maps and find various ability props to strengthen yourself and break through More challenges.

In this never-seeing government underground secret laboratory, you are a goldfish brain artificial human wearing a life-saving device. As one of the researchers in a government underground secret laboratory, he carried out many unknown experiments and development. Until one day, the laboratory alarm suddenly sounded and all the security robots and the base facilities were suddenly out of control. Under the prompt of the AI assistant, it was learned that someone must have invaded the lowest control switchboard. You need to reach the lowest level in a situation full of runaway machines and experimental objects, find the black hand behind the scenes, and regain control of the base system.
